revised_title: Discovery of New Hydrocarbons from Coal-Tar
tldr: The author discovered new hydrocarbons from coal-tar and studied their properties and reactions. These hydrocarbons were found to be colorless, oily liquids that combined with bromine and nitric acid. The author also observed that these hydrocarbons could be oxidized into various acids and compounds. The findings suggest that these hydrocarbons might be polymers of the acetylene series.
